title: Ice Font
content:
Just seeing if anyone might know any similar fonts to this if not identical.

Thanks,  
Ce

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110316053838im_/http:/typophile.com/files/chilled_3772.jpg)
author: curtis_eberhardt

comments.content:
I haven't seen an italic version before, but this is the same as the freeware font [Batman Forever](http://web.archive.org/web/20110316053838/http:/www.dafont.com/font.php?file=batman_forever&page=1&nb_ppp_old=10&text=CHILL+CHAMBER&nb_ppp=10&psize=m&classt=pop). Maybe the shear was done manually?

There is an oblique version available of the, imho, superior typeface, [Russell Square](http://web.archive.org/web/20110316053838/http:/www.linotype.com/12998/russellsquareromanoblique-font.html?PHPSESSID=34b93dae0d6ad41803fadb6bbab93932) that you might like to look at as well.

Thanks for the info and believe me, I'm not looking at this font because I love it. Someone wanted something similar in feel for this same company. Its a matter of compromising between the jagged iciness and compressed negative spaces-- and a superior font.

I do know about Russel Square-- but thanks-- it is better but not quite right for this project. I've looked through tons of display fonts and couldn't find anything else close. May be just a matter of modifying an existing font for this purpose.

Thanks for the tips!
